member.summary: The game version running on the server

member.name: T:DerAtrox.Arma3LauncherLib.SSQLib.SourceServerQuery
member.summary: Used to retreive information from a Source server

member.name: M:DerAtrox.Arma3LauncherLib.SSQLib.SourceServerQuery.Server(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Pings the specified Source server to retreive information about it such as the server name, max players, current number of players, etc.
member.param: The string containing the IP address or hostname of the server
member.returns: Information about the server or throws an SSQLServerException if it could not be retreived

member.name: M:DerAtrox.Arma3LauncherLib.SSQLib.SourceServerQuery.Server(System.Net.EndPoint)
member.summary: Pings the specified Source server to retreive information about it such as the server name, max players, current number of players, etc.
member.param: The IPEndPoint object containing the IP address and port of the server
member.returns: Information about the server or throws an SSQLServerException if it could not be retreived

member.name: M:DerAtrox.Arma3LauncherLib.SSQLib.SourceServerQuery.Players(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retreives information about the players on a Source server
member.param: The string containing the IP address or hostname of the server
member.returns: A List of PlayerInfo or throws an SSQLServerException if the server could not be reached

member.name: M:DerAtrox.Arma3LauncherLib.SSQLib.SourceServerQuery.Players(System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Retreives information about the players on a Source server
member.param: The IPEndPoint object storing the IP address and port of the server
member.returns: A List of PlayerInfo or throws an SSQLServerException if the server could not be reached
